mapper.select: select * from criticboard order by criticNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into criticboard (criticTitle, criticShortTitle, criticContent, criticWriter) values (#{criticTitle}, #{criticShortTitle}, #{criticContent}, #{criticWriter})
mapper.select: select criticNo, criticTitle, criticShortTitle, criticContent, criticWriter, criticregDate, criticViewCnt from criticboard where criticNo = #{criticNo}
select criticNo, criticTitle, criticWriter, criticregDate, criticViewCnt from criticboard order by criticNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select criticNo, criticTitle, criticWriter, criticregDate, criticViewCnt from criticboard
where criticTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where criticContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where criticTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or criticContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where criticWriter LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by criticNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(criticNo) from criticboard
WHERE criticTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE criticContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE criticTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or criticContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE criticWriter LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
